author: Mahatma Gandhi
title: A Guide to hell
body: An eye for an eye ends up only making the whole world blind.

author: Mother Teresa
title: Come Be My Light
body: If you judge people, you have no time to love them.

author: Matthew
title: Matthew
body: Let the little children come to me...for heaven belongs to such as these

author: Gautama Buddha
title: The Miracle of Mindfulness
body: The mind is everything. What you think you become.

author: Dalai Lama
title: The Art of Happiness
body: ...happiness is determined by one's state of mind than by external events.

author: Paul
title: Ephesians
body: Even so husbands should love their wives as their own bodies. He who loves his wife loves himself.

author: Bruce Lee
title: Striking Thoughts
body: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.

author: Albert Schweitzer
title: Out of My Life and Thought
body: By respect for life we become religious in a way that is elementary, profound and alive

author: Joan of Arc
title: Joan of Arc: In Her Own Words
